entry.title: Starisian-Technologies/starmus-audio-recorder: The Starmus Audio Recorder is a lightweight, front-end WordPress plugin that allows users to record audio directly in the browser using the MediaRecorder API.
entry.content: The Starmus Audio Recorder is a lightweight, front-end WordPress plugin that allows users to record audio directly in the browser using the MediaRecorder API.

entry.title: eriveltondasilva/currency.js: A lightweight and reliable JavaScript library for precise currency operations, built to safely handle monetary values without floating point errors.

entry.title: roxylius/ChatGPT_unofficial_API_Node: Unofficial ChatGPT Puppeteer API: A lightweight Node.js/Express backend that automates the ChatGPT web interface—with persistent sessions, conversation threading, and “Reason” & “Search” modes—via Puppeteer.
entry.content: Unofficial ChatGPT Puppeteer API: A lightweight Node.js/Express backend that automates the ChatGPT web interface—with persistent sessions, conversation threading, and “Reason” & “Search” modes—via Puppeteer.

entry.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

entry.title: SumandeepSahoo/nofication_service: Notification_service was developed as a part of Pepsales.ai intern assignment. The objective was to build a lightweight, queue-based notification service for sending Email, SMS, and In-App messages with auto-retry support using RabbitMQ and Node.js.
entry.content: Notification_service was developed as a part of Pepsales.ai intern assignment. The objective was to build a lightweight, queue-based notification service for sending Email, SMS, and In-App messages with auto-retry support using RabbitMQ and Node.js.

entry.title: mwarcc/dbson: A lightweight, zero-dependency BSON (Binary JSON) implementation for Node.js. This library provides serialization and deserialization of BSON documents with support for all BSON data types.
entry.content: A lightweight, zero-dependency BSON (Binary JSON) implementation for Node.js. This library provides serialization and deserialization of BSON documents with support for all BSON data types.

entry.title: BAHEKARPRANAV/ButterPop.js: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.
entry.content: 🧈 ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. entry.title: sonicdino/dinosonic: Dinosonic is a fast, lightweight music streaming server built with Deno, inspired by Subsonic.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: orc13a/AmbuStatus: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.
entry.content: AmbuStatus is a lightweight monitoring system designed for ambulance stations. It detects whether ambulances are parked in their designated bays inside the garage and displays their status live on a screen in the crew common area.

entry.title: luckaty/File-Explorer: A lightweight file explorer built with Node.js, allowing users to navigate and view server-side directories and files through a web interface. Great for learning about file system access and Express routing in Node.js.
entry.content: A lightweight file explorer built with Node.js, allowing users to navigate and view server-side directories and files through a web interface. Great for learning about file system access and Express routing in Node.js.
